contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | image = <!-- Please do not put a fair-use image here, it will be deleted - see [[WP:NONFREE]] --> | caption = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|mf=yes|1989|3|15}} | birth_place = [[Eugene, Oregon|Eugene]], [[Oregon]], [[United States|U.S.]] | occupation = Actress | years_active = 1995–present }} '''Caitlin Elizabeth Wachs''' (pronounced ''wax''; born March 15, 1989) is an American [[actress]] who has acted in several [[film]]s and [[TV series]]. She appeared alongside [[Ally Walker]] and [[Robert Davi]] in ''[[Profiler (TV series)|Profiler]]'', and played the president's daughter, [[Rebecca Calloway]], on the series ''[[Commander in Chief (TV series)|Commander in Chief]]''.<ref>[http://www.snmag.com/MAGAZINE/Destination-Success/Caitlin-Wachs-Daughter-in-Chief.html Caitlin Wachs: Daughter in Chief], Film Reference</ref> Wachs was born in [[Eugene, Oregon]]. Her parents are Patrice Wachs, a [[graphic designer]], and Allan Wachs, a producer of [[music video]]s.<ref>[http://www.filmreference.com/film/27/Caitlin-Wachs.html Caitlin Wachs Biography (1989-)], Film Reference</ref> ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film ! Year ! Title ! Role ! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 1996 | ''Race Against Time: The Search for Sarah'' | Amy | TV film |- | 1996 | ''Shattered Mind'' | Molly | TV film |- | 1999 | ''[[Shiloh 2: Shiloh Season]]'' | Dara Lynn Preston | |- | 2000 | ''[[My Dog Skip (film)|My Dog Skip]]'' | Rivers Applewhite | |- | 2000 | ''[[The Next Best Thing]]'' | Rachel | |- | 2000 | ''[[Phantom of the Megaplex]]'' | Karen Riley | [[List of Disney Channel Original Movies|Disney Channel Original Movie]] |- | 2000 | ''[[Air Bud: World Pup]]'' | Andrea Framm | Direct-to-video |- | 2000 | ''[[Thirteen Days (film)|Thirteen Days]]'' | Kathy O'Donnell | |- | 2002 | ''[[Air Bud: Seventh Inning Fetch]]'' | Andrea Framm | Direct-to-video |- | 2002 | ''[[Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood (film)|Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood]]'' | Young Vivi Walker | |- | 2003 | ''[[Inspector Gadget 2]]'' | Penny | Direct-to-video sequel to ''[[Inspector Gadget (film)|Inspector Gadget]]'' |- | 2005 | ''[[Kids in America (film)|Kids in America]]'' | Katie Carmichael | |- | 2008 | ''[[The Legend of Bloody Mary]]'' | Mary Worth | |- | 2009 |''[[Santa Buddies: The Legend of Santa Paws]]'' | Andrea | |- | 2009 | ''[[Endless Bummer (film)|Endless Bummer]]'' | Anne | |- | 2010 | ''Privileged'' | Jill | |- | 2010 | ''[[Beneath the Blue]]'' | Alyssa | |- | 2013 | ''[[National Lampoon Presents: Surf Party]]'' | Anne | |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Television ! 18 episodes |- | 2006 | ''[[Shark (TV series)|Shark]]'' | Cat Crosby | "Love Triangle" (season 1: episode 8) |- | 2006 | ''[[Masters of Horror]]'' | Angelique Burcell | "[[Pro-Life (Masters of Horror)|Pro-Life]]" (season 2: episode 5) |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb name|0905157}} * {{Twitter|pisceanflower89}} {{Authority control|VIAF=49451582}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Wachs, Caitlin | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actress | DATE OF BIRTH = 1989-03-15 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Eugene, Oregon|Eugene]], [[Oregon]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Wachs, Caitlin}} [[Category:1989 births]] [[Category:American child actresses]] [[Category:American film actresses]] [[Category:American soap opera actresses]] [[Category:American television actresses]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Actresses from Eugene, Oregon]]
